subject: Web3
title: Generative Art on Chain
description: A quick, practical guide to Generative Art on Chain.

hook.text: Art Blocks creates art using algorithms. Each piece is generated by code at the moment of purchase.

buildup.text: Artists write programs that produce unique visual outputs. Every mint creates a one-of-a-kind piece from the same algorithm.

discovery.text: Tyler Hobbs' 'Fidenza' series became iconic. Individual pieces sold for millions at auction.

twist.text: The code itself is stored on the blockchain. The art can be regenerated forever â€” it doesn't depend on any server.

climax.text: Generative art proved NFTs aren't just JPEGs. The code is the art, and the blockchain preserves it permanently.

punchline.text: The artist writes code. The code creates the art. The chain keeps it forever.

quiz.question: What makes generative art NFTs unique?
options: Each piece is created by an algorithm at the moment of purchase
